results.title: Clinical profiling and screening for HNF4alpha and GCK gene mutations in Kashmiri patients with maturity-onset diabetes of the young (MODY).
results.text_hl: On diagnosis, no @<m>DISEASE_Mason_Type_Diabetes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562772 @@@MODY@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was given immediate @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@; instead, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (68%) or @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulphonyl-urea@@@ (28%) and dietary changes (4%) were recommended.

citations.NLM: Firdous P, Hassan T, Nissar K, Masoodi SR, Ganai BA. Clinical profiling and screening for HNF4alpha and GCK gene mutations in Kashmiri patients with maturity-onset diabetes of the young (MODY). Prim Care Diabetes. 2022 Apr;16(2):325-332. PMID: 35131168
citations.BibTeX: @article{35131168, title={Clinical profiling and screening for HNF4alpha and GCK gene mutations in Kashmiri patients with maturity-onset diabetes of the young (MODY).}, author={Firdous P and Hassan T and Nissar K and Masoodi SR and Ganai BA}, journal={Prim Care Diabetes}, volume={16}, number={2}, pages={325-332}}

results.title: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Diagnosed at the Age of Eight Years: A Case Report.
results.text_hl: As his @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ was an important issue, we initiated semaglutide at a dose of 0.25 mg later on. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was stopped due to @DISEASE_Dyspepsia @DISEASE_MESH:D004415 @@@dyspepsia@@@.

citations.NLM: Hasan MR, Hasan M, Aharama A. Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Diagnosed at the Age of Eight Years: A Case Report. Cureus. 2025 May;17(5):e85065. PMID: 40585621
citations.BibTeX: @article{40585621, title={Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Diagnosed at the Age of Eight Years: A Case Report.}, author={Hasan MR and Hasan M and Aharama A}, journal={Cureus}, volume={17}, number={5}, pages={e85065}}

results.title: Young onset type 2 diabetic patients might be more sensitive to metformin compared to late onset type 2 diabetic patients
results.text_hl: A total of 95 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (19 with @<m>DISEASE_Mason_Type_Diabetes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562772 @@@YOD@@@ and 76 with @DISEASE_Diabetic_Neuropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003929 @@@LOD@@@) received the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ add-on therapy.

citations.NLM: Li FF, Liu BL, Yin GP, Zhang DF, Zhai XF, Chen MY, Su XF, Wu JD, Ye L, Ma JH. Young onset type 2 diabetic patients might be more sensitive to metformin compared to late onset type 2 diabetic patients Sci Rep. 2017 Nov 27;7(1):16382. PMID: 29180640
citations.BibTeX: @article{29180640, title={Young onset type 2 diabetic patients might be more sensitive to metformin compared to late onset type 2 diabetic patients}, author={Li FF and Liu BL and Yin GP and Zhang DF and Zhai XF and Chen MY and Su XF and Wu JD and Ye L and Ma JH}, journal={Sci Rep}, volume={7}, number={1}, pages={16382}}

results.title: Genetics of type 2 diabetes mellitus and other specific types of diabetes; its role in treatment modalities.
results.text_hl: More recently, studies reported variants within a novel gene, @GENE_TCF7L2 @GENE_6934 @@@TCF7L2@@@, as a putative susceptibility gene for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ across many ethnic backgrounds around the world. @<m>DISEASE_Mason_Type_Diabetes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562772 @@@MODY@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ respond better to @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulphonylureas@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, while @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Transient_Neonatal_1 @DISEASE_MESH:C563322 @@@neonatal diabetes@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with genetic mutations can be changed from @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ to oral drugs.

citations.NLM: Kota SK, Meher LK, Jammula S, Kota SK, Modi KD. Genetics of type 2 diabetes mellitus and other specific types of diabetes; its role in treatment modalities. Diabetes Metab Syndr. 2012 Jan-Mar;6(1):54-8. PMID: 23014256
citations.BibTeX: @article{23014256, title={Genetics of type 2 diabetes mellitus and other specific types of diabetes; its role in treatment modalities.}, author={Kota SK and Meher LK and Jammula S and Kota SK and Modi KD}, journal={Diabetes Metab Syndr}, volume={6}, number={1}, pages={54-8}}
